name: Trivia Trek
overview: A trivia journey with many more modern (circa 1984) questions than most similar games of the time. Trivia Trek is a trivia game for one or two players. It comes with 50 trivia categories, each with 10 multiple choice questions, for a total of 500 questions (with 2000 answer choices). The software also provides the capability to create (and store) your own trivia questions which can then be used during play.
